title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 375.1 - Minimum benefit values
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 375.1 - Minimum benefit values

State Regulations

If the cash disability benefits equal at least 100
percent of the disability benefits payable under section
204
of the Workers' Compensation Law, the plan may be accepted. This section shall
take effect July 1, 1989. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
375.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
